examples: A driver was killed in a freak accident when a cow fell from a bridge. The manager described the 8?0 defeat as a freak result.
This was no more than a freak of history.
By some freak of fate, she won an enormous sum of money.

meanings.meaning: person with a very strong interest in sth

examples: For the real speed freak, there is a 2-litre, fuel-injection version of the car.
Her dad seems to be a bit of a control freak, always keeping a close watch on what anybody's doing.

meanings.meaning: sb who is considered to be strange

examples: Other students regarded him as a freak.
I felt a bit of a freak in my strange clothes.
